div.p: We thank the people and village leaders in the project area for their participation and facilitation, respectively, in the household surveys, as well as the survey field team. We also thank the participants of an expert meeting in Arusha, Tanzania, in 2016 and current and former colleagues at all of our institutions who provided valuable input and feedback.

The contents of this manuscript are the sole responsibility of the Evidence Project (Population Council and Population Reference Bureau) and the Tuungane Project (The Nature Conservancy and Pathfinder International) and do not necessarily reflect the views of USAID or the United States Government.
